description: Joshua Werber created designs inspired by T’s story on women artists.
title: Floral Headpieces, Inspired by Female Artists
title_page: Floral Headpieces, Inspired by Female Artists - The New York Times
text: For our story on women artists in museums, five designers created working uniforms for female artists from history, exclusively for T. To accompany the piece, the Brooklyn-based floral artist Joshua Werber created a headpiece to complement each design — and modeled them himself. “In designing the headpieces to accompany the uniforms for this story, the sketches and source materials were the primary inspiration,” he said. “Specific references to the artists’ work and the intentions set by the designers influenced the shapes, forms and styles.” Click through our slide show to see Werber’s floral designs.
